short_summary: Contract for Environmental Remediation and Treatment of Polluted Soils
description: Notice of Invitation to Qualify for Contract for Environmental Remediation and Treatment of Polluted Soils
full_summary:
================================

**Tender Announcement: Phase 2 - Former CFSA Uplands Soil Remediation**

### Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing an Invitation to Qualify for the Phase 2 - Former CFSA Uplands Soil Remediation project, solicitation number WS4277522731.

### Funding and Timeline

The project has an expected contract start date of None and an expected end date of 2024-03-22. The procurement method for this project is Competitive - Selective Tendering.

### Project Scope

The scope of the project includes the remediation of polluted soil at the former CFSA Uplands site in British Columbia, Canada. The project requires the provision of Environmental Services, specifically the removal and treatment of polluted soil.

### Tender Requirements

To be considered for this project, interested bidders must demonstrate their qualifications and experience in providing Environmental Services, specifically in soil remediation. The selection criteria for this project is Lowest Price.

### Submission Guidelines

Submissions should be made electronically via [insert submission platform]. The tender closing date is 2023-12-01T14:00:00.

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Simon Leung, Contracting Officer, at simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Important Details

* This is a Competitive - Selective Tendering project.
* The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest price that meets the required specifications.
* Bidders must demonstrate their qualifications and experience in providing Environmental Services, specifically in soil remediation.
